articles.title: LeBron James breaks scoring record: How close he is to 40,000 points - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Lakers' LeBron James could score his 40,000th career point Saturday. Charts show how he's distancing himself from former players and today's.
articles.content:
With just nine points Saturday night LeBron James will become the first NBA player to score more than 40,000 points in his career. How did he do it? Three words:
